basic.description: This course explores methods and procedures of surface mapping and subsurface sectioning including distance measurements, traverse computations and topographic mapping, and Global Positioning Systems. Use of field equipment and procedures to measure distances, elevations, angles, and perform complete surveys. Computer Aided Design (CAD) Laboratory for basic engineering drafting.
basic.subject: CEG
basic.title: Introduction to Geomatics Engineering Lab

extra.enrollment_requirement: Coerequisite: CEG 2202. Pre- or Corequisite: EGN 2123.
